nodes.text: The Oldskep was a bulk freighter that was used by the company Imperial Mining, Ltd. during the Galactic Civil War, which was named after an IML executive. After IML established a base on the planet Alluuvia in the Elrood sector, the Oldskep was laden with supplies and dispatched to the Alluuvian system, accompanied by the starship Berea-3 and eight TIE fighters. However, on arrival in the system, the IML fleet was attacked and defeated by a Rebel Alliance ship and the Shepherd-class Herdship Varnay.
